overview: Crash landing in a small plane, the Ryan family is stranded on a high-desert mesa. No food, no way to communicate with civilization, time is running out as they face a life and death race for survival.  A wounded cougar stalks young Mike as he looks for help, alone in the wilderness. Disaster strikes the sheriffâ€™s rescue party. Have their prayers really been heard? Action and suspense amid untamed scenic beauty. Absorbing family entertainment!
tagline: They faced death... and found life.
title: Survival
